title: YASUO "E" SWEEPING BLADE - Give It Clarity
body:
[This ability](https://www.mobafire.com/league-of-legends/ability/sweeping-blade-647) is a pain in the ass because there is no clarity on it.

It says: _"When sweeping blade is cast on a target, the target will get marked for 10 / 9 / 8 / 7 / 6 seconds. Yasuo cannot use Sweeping Blade on an enemy that's already been marked."_

I can't see the little cool down circle on the minion's only the Yasuo player can.

How does Riot expect anyone let alone low elo players to remember which minions he dashed to first and keep 6 mental timers going, while having to look at the mini map, last hitting etc.

LET ME SEE THE COOL DOWN CIRCLE ON THE MINIONS! 
LET EVERYONE SEE IT!

Thank you

replies.body: Yasuo is very easy to play against in low elo, just sit under your turret, he'll fail his dash and end up dead to the turret even if you do nothing.

And I will not say otherwise. 

I like the champion and play style, Riot should help him to be a strong/balanced pick in low and high elo, but they need to improve the clarity of his game and make him more understandable to play against, like they did with many other champions.

I DONT WANT the cooldown of "Q" "W" "E" "R" of ANY champion. Displayed for all to see.
